rules_text:
Haste
[i]Business Prosperity[/i] – Whenever Anna, Traveling Merchant deals combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token and forge.
[i]Secret Shop[/i] – {3}: Exile the top two cards of your library. Chose one of them. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card. If a mana from a Treasure was spent to activate this ability, you may play both cards.
